items.sentence: Do you think that Tom could do that by himself?
I have to lose weight, so I\'m going on a diet.
I haven\'t even thought about that possibility.
I haven\'t spoken with Tom since that happened.
I haven\'t worn this tie in almost three years.
My flight back to Boston leaves in three hours.
My girlfriend sometimes flirts with other boys.
My parents gave me a house when we got married.
My sister has been knitting since this morning.
My three-year-old niece kissed me on the cheek.
